subject: Shipping question
description_text:
Hello.
I want to buy a pedal baseplate. Can I send it to an address in mainland
China and will it arrive without any additional processing or charges?

Just to put this in context, an acquaintance would receive it at that
location in China and then bring it to me in his luggage when he returns
from his trip.

Regards.

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 4958 中
